name: Simple Derivation of the Lifetime and the Distribution of Faces for a Binary Subdivision Model
abstraction: Let V//i be the set of vertices of degree i, i equals 1,2,3, in a random binary search tree. We prove that E( vertical V//i vertical ) equals n/3 plus O(1), for i equals 1,2,3. This result tells us that the expected tree shape does not contain very long path subgraphs; thus in a sense the expected shape tends to be balanced.
